daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A fire on Roosevelt Island resulted in one death and three firefighter injuries, while New Yorkers are responding to increased ICE raids by stocking up on whistles; additionally, a report highlights hazards from last-mile deliveries, and the FAA is lifting emergency flight limits as NYC airports return to normal.

community.summary_md:
### Community
